name: The Sound of Light
description:
Student Game by Melina Behnert, Mia Schulz, Arianna Buscemi Janeiro and Pauline Lechler

Sound: Luca Roderus, Nina Jansen, Thomas Trautmann

University of Applied Science Darmstadt 2. Semester, 2022

A jellyfish causes a huge mess at home and gets lost in the deep ocean. To find its way back and help out the village, it needs to find friends for help and guidance, but also needs to avoid sea creatures.

Solve riddles and use your brightness to let little sparks of light arise even in the darkest part of the ocean.  Get lost in the stunning environments with glowing corals, listen to the mysterious and wonderful sounds of the ocean and beware of the monstrous creatures that lurk in the dark. Watch as the little jellyfish hugs his friends and collects more strength, to get through even the strongest currents.
